attributes.title: Just don’t do it💩
attributes.review: Every time you open the app there is a orange disturbing image. It is very scary and my child started to cry. Please use caution when opening app!!!🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: Him, the app....no
attributes.review: I think just like overall from the moment I saw it it was bad. And I felt this sudden edge to yell to think that this app exists. So yeah. Well no actually.😉

attributes.title: ✨DISGUSTING ✨
attributes.review: This app makes me just feel sick. Also, when I opened the app the orange Cheeto big face popped off, I was terrified. My life was at risk. I almost got a heart attack😔. Overall this app is ✨horrible✨.

this app killed my dog!! i downloaded this app to support the man of my dreams 👀🥵💕 as soon as i downloaded it my dog magically ended up in the microwave and exploded 😞😞😞 rip nugget. DO NOT i repeat DO NOT get this app unless you hate ur dogs.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING 🤢
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app i felt sick to my stomach absolutely disgusting and when a picture of a giant orange cockroach came on my screen i immediately threw up absolutely unacceptable

attributes.title: Worst app of all time
attributes.review: This is the most stupidest app I have ever seen. First of all I don’t even like him at all he is a very bad president the choices he make are VERY ALL DUMB PERIOD!.just saying what I believe.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: Just no. Do not recommend. I am mentally scarred by this app and don’t want anyone else to feel the way I did after using this app.
